snippet: Mr. Murrin, a playwright and avant-garde impresario who became known as the Alien Comic, was apt to put on performances almost anywhere.
abstract: Tom Murrin, performance artist, playwright and avant-garde impresario, dies at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Murrin, a playwright and avant-garde impresario who became known as the Alien Comic, was apt to put on performances almost anywhere.

headline.print_headline: Tom Murrin, 73, Alien Comic And Master of Found Props
